altigaCertStatsMibModule.name: altigaCertStatsMibModule
altigaCertStatsMibModule.contactinfo: Cisco Systems 170 W Tasman Drive San Jose, CA 95134 USA Tel: +1 800 553-NETS E-mail: cs-cvpn3000@cisco.com
altigaCertStatsMibModule.description: The Altiga Digital Certificates Statistics MIB models counters and objects that are of management interest for digital certificates. Acronyms The following acronyms are used in this document: CA: Certificate Authority CRL: Certificate Revocation List IP: Internet Protocol MIB: Management Information Base

alCertStatsServerTable.name: alCertStatsServerTable
alCertStatsServerTable.description: List table listing the CA servers.

alCertStatsServerEntry.name: alCertStatsServerEntry
alCertStatsServerEntry.description: An entry representing a CA server.

alCertStatsServerAddress.name: alCertStatsServerAddress
alCertStatsServerAddress.description: The IP address of this CA.

alCertStatsServerPortNumber.name: alCertStatsServerPortNumber
alCertStatsServerPortNumber.description: The port number of this CA.

alCertStatsServerCertRequests.name: alCertStatsServerCertRequests
alCertStatsServerCertRequests.description: The total number of certificate request packets sent to this CA since client start-up. This does not include retransmissions.

alCertStatsServerCertRetransmissions.name: alCertStatsServerCertRetransmissions
alCertStatsServerCertRetransmissions.description: The total number of certificate request packets retransmitted to this CA since client start-up.

alCertStatsServerCertRcvd.name: alCertStatsServerCertRcvd
alCertStatsServerCertRcvd.description: The total number of certificates received from this server since client start-up.

alCertStatsServerCertPendingRequests.name: alCertStatsServerCertPendingRequests
alCertStatsServerCertPendingRequests.description: The total number of certificate request packets destined for this server that have not yet timed out or received a response. This variable is incremented when certificate request is sent and decremented due to receipt of a certificate, a timeout or retransmission.

alCertStatsServerCertTimeouts.name: alCertStatsServerCertTimeouts
alCertStatsServerCertTimeouts.description: The total number of certificate timeouts to this server since client startup.

alCertStatsServerCRLRequests.name: alCertStatsServerCRLRequests
alCertStatsServerCRLRequests.description: The total number of CRL request packets sent to this CA since client start-up. This does not include retransmissions.

alCertStatsServerCRLRetransmissions.name: alCertStatsServerCRLRetransmissions
alCertStatsServerCRLRetransmissions.description: The total number of CRL request packets retransmitted to this CA since client start-up.

alCertStatsServerCRLRcvd.name: alCertStatsServerCRLRcvd
alCertStatsServerCRLRcvd.description: The total number of CRL received from this server since client start-up.

alCertStatsServerCRLPendingRequests.name: alCertStatsServerCRLPendingRequests
alCertStatsServerCRLPendingRequests.description: The total number of CRL request packets destined for this server that have not yet timed out or received a response. This variable is incremented when certificate request is sent and decremented due to receipt of a certificate, a timeout or retransmission.

alCertStatsServerCRLTimeouts.name: alCertStatsServerCRLTimeouts
alCertStatsServerCRLTimeouts.description: The total number of CRL timeouts to this server since client startup.

altigaCertStatsMibCompliance.name: altigaCertStatsMibCompliance
altigaCertStatsMibCompliance.description: The compliance statement for agents which implement the Altiga Digital Certificates Statistics MIB.
